Proton_Volley_Quick.help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Proton_Volley_Quick.targetHelp: The Proton Volley has reduced your Defenses.

Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Neutrino_Bolt_Contamination.help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Bolt can reduce the target's Defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt_Contamination.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

Contaminated_Strike_Contamination.help: You charge your fist with harmful radioactive particles and quickly strike your foe dealing Light Energy and Smashing damage as well as reducing their defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Contaminated_Strike_Contamination.targetHelp: Your defense has been reduced by Contaminated Strike!

X-Ray_Beam_Contamination.help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
X-Ray_Beam_Contamination.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the X-Ray Beam.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

Radiation_Siphon_Contamination.help: You pummel your foe with a deadly smashing attack dealing High Energy and Smashing damage and reducing their defense. Hitting Contaminated targets will also heal you for a large amount of health over 3 seconds and remove the Contaminated effect from the target. However, uncontaminated targets have a moderate chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: High Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Radiation_Siphon_Contamination.targetHelp: Your defense has been reduced by Radiation Siphon!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

Devastating_Blow_Contamination.help: You hammer your foe with a brutal smashing attack charged with a lethal dose of radiation. Your target will suffer Extreme Energy and Smashing damage, will have its defense reduced and will be disoriented for a short time. Devastating Blow has an increased change to critically hit. Affected enemies will be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
Devastating_Blow_Contamination.shortHelp: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe -Def, Disorient, Special
